content: Can't find your language? Contact us at <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> to take part in the translation program and get rewards.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when the user cannot find their preferred language in the available options. It appears as a tooltip in the profile settings section, inviting users to contact support for further assistance. Translators should aim to preserve the friendly and encouraging tone of this text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Can't find your language?" is translated as "لا يمكن العثور على اللغة الخاصة بك؟", which is literally "Is it not possible to find your language?" A more natural translation might be "هل اللغة غير موجودة؟" or "لا توجد لغتك؟"
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هل اللغة غير موجودة؟

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent and likely incorrect. They should match, and their purpose is unclear. Assuming they are meant for `<em>` or `<strong>`, they should be corrected.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace <1> with and with

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is not accurately conveyed. 'Tərcümədə iştirak etmək' literally means 'to participate in translation'. A more natural phrasing might be something like 'tərcümə proqramına qoşulmaq' (to join the translation program).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rewording to something like: 'Tərcümə proqramına qoşulmaq istəyirsinizsə bizimlə əlaqə saxlayın'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>` tags are inconsistent with the English content. It's important to ensure the structure is the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that the placement of the `<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>` tag is identical to the English version.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to take part in the translation program" is translated as "за да се включите в превода". A more accurate translation would convey the purpose of participating in a translation *program* rather than just a single translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: за да се включите в програмата за преводи

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "zúčastněte se překladu" is overly literal. A more natural translation of 'take part in the translation program' would be something like 'zapojte se do překladatelského programu' or 'přidejte se do překladatelského programu'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zapojte se do překladatelského programu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English implies 'get rewards' in relation to participating in the translation program. The Czech translation implies they get a reward simply by contacting support. While not a critical error, it shifts the meaning slightly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: a získejte odměnu za účast v překladatelském programu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation" is not the most natural way to say it in Spanish. A more common and accurate translation would be "participar en el programa de traducción".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: participar en el programa de traducción

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "obtener recompensas" is grammatically correct, a more natural and idiomatic translation for "get rewards" would be "recibir recompensas".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: recibir recompensas

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation" is not the most natural way to express "take part in the translation program" in French. It implies participating in the act of translating itself, rather than the program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous ne trouvez pas votre langue ? Contactez-nous à <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> pour participer au programme de traduction et obtenez des récompenses.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content mentions "rewards", while the French translation uses "avantages". While 'avantages' can mean rewards, it's a broader term and doesn't convey the same specific meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous ne trouvez pas votre langue ? Contactez-nous à <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> pour participer au programme de traduction et obtenez des récompenses.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation of "Can't find your language?" is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing in Armenian would be something like "If you can't find your language..." or "Is your language not listed?".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If you can't find your language... or Is your language not listed?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "մասնակցել թարգմանչական ծրագրին և ստանալ պարգևներ" can be improved for flow. It translates literally to "participate in the translation program and receive rewards." A more engaging phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: to join the translation program and receive rewards.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'take part in the translation' is not the most natural way to express 'take part in the translation program' in Italian. It suggests participating in the act of translating, rather than joining a program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'partecipare al programma di traduzione' for a more accurate translation of 'take part in the translation program'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is not accurately reflected in the Japanese translation. The current translation, "翻訳に参加して", is more like 'participate in the translation' without conveying the idea of a 'program'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 言語が見つかりませんか？翻訳プログラムに参加して報酬を得るには、<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>までご連絡ください。 (Gengo ga mitsukarimasen ka? Honyaku puroguramu ni sanka shite hōshū o eru ni wa, <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> made go-renraku kudasai.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is not standard. It appears to be an attempt to wrap around the email address. However, it doesn't appear to have a closing tag or be properly formatted. It also should not be translated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The tag should be examined and corrected by the developers to ensure it is properly implemented and handles translations as intended. In the translated context, the tag itself should remain unchanged. The expectation is that the placeholders and tags are preserved during translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Can't find your language?' is translated as '아직 모국어가 없나요?'. While understandable, a more accurate translation might be '원하는 언어가 없나요?' which directly translates to 'Don't you have the language you want?' or something similar to preserve the original intent of searching for a specific language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Can't find your language?' as '원하는 언어가 없나요?'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag `<1>{{supportEmail}}</1>` is consistent with the English source. The Korean translation keeps the same format, which is acceptable but could be reviewed for cultural appropriateness in presentation.  It's slightly unusual to have HTML tags visible in text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the need and appropriateness of including HTML tags within the translated text based on the platform's style guidelines.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ເພື່ອໃຫ້ພວກເຮົາມີສ່ວນຮ່ວມໃນການແປພາສາ' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'to take part in the translation program'. It translates to 'so that we can participate in translation'. The intent is to invite the user to participate, not to state that 'we' will participate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພື່ອເຂົ້າຮ່ວມໂຄງການແປພາສາ, ກະລຸນາຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາທີ່ <1> {{supportEmail}} </1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation lacks the necessary Lao punctuation, particularly a question mark after 'ບໍ່ສາມາດຫາພາສາຂອງທ່ານໄດ້ແມ່ນບໍ່?'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບໍ່ສາມາດຫາພາສາຂອງທ່ານໄດ້ແມ່ນບໍ່?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "take part in the translation program" is not accurately reflected in "tulkotu".  "Tulkotu" simply means "to translate". It doesn't convey the broader concept of participating in a translation program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrase like "piedalīties tulkošanas programmā" which means "to participate in a translation program".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are unusual and might not be the expected formatting. Confirm that this is the intended format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Check the standard format for the content and adjust accordingly. It might be simpler HTML tags like <span> or <div>, or no tags at all.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to take part in the translation" is not the most natural translation of "to take part in the translation program". A more accurate rendering would convey the idea of contributing to the translation process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider: "om mee te helpen met de vertaling" or "om te helpen met de vertaling"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "beloningen te krijgen" is a slightly awkward phrasing in Dutch. A more fluent translation would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider: "en beloningen te ontvangen" or simply "en beloningen"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'take part in the translation program' is not accurately reflected in the Polish translation 'pomóc w tłumaczeniu'. 'Pomóc w tłumaczeniu' translates to 'help with translation', implying assistance rather than participation in a program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation of 'take part in the translation program', such as 'dołączyć do programu tłumaczeniowego' or 'wziąć udział w programie tłumaczeniowym'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'get rewards' is translated as 'zdobyć za nie nagrody'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly unnatural in Polish. 'Zdobyć' implies earning or acquiring rewards through effort.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation for 'get rewards' would be 'otrzymać nagrody' or 'dostać nagrody'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Can't find your language?' is somewhat informally translated as 'Limba dvs nu este afișată?'. A more accurate and natural translation might be 'Nu găsiți limba dvs?' or 'Limba dumneavoastră nu este listată?'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nu găsiți limba dvs?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'to take part in the translation program and get rewards' is translated as 'dacă doriți să contribuiți la traducerea și să obțineți beneficii'. While technically correct, it lacks the emphasis on participation in a *program*.  A more accurate translation would reflect this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dacă doriți să participați la programul de traducere și să obțineți beneficii.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not standard. They seem intended to mark the email address, but a more common approach would use `<1>` and `</1>` for clarity or another standard format.  They are also inconsistent with the English content. It is more likely to be an HTML tag indicating a variable, like `{supportEmail}`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Check for correct HTML tag or confirm variable placeholder. If it's a variable, ensure consistency with English format (e.g., `{supportEmail}`).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "get rewards" is translated as "получить до 1 года бесплатного использования" which means "get up to 1 year of free usage." This deviates significantly from the original meaning of receiving rewards or incentives. It implies a specific, time-limited free usage, not general rewards.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation closer to "получить вознаграждение" (get a reward) or "получить бонусы" (get bonuses) to better reflect the original meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The formatting tags <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> appear identical in both English and Russian translations. While technically correct, it’s a minor point. It might be worthwhile to ensure consistency across all translations for this particular formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the formatting guidelines for consistent tag application across all translations. Potentially consider different formatting if the surrounding content or style calls for it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Can't find your language?" is not accurately translated. A more natural Sinhala phrasing would be something like "ඔබට අවශ්‍ය භාෂාව නොමැත්තේ?" or "ඔබගේ බޭරුම් භාෂාව මෙහි නොමැත්තේ?"
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට අවශ්‍ය භාෂාව මෙහි නොමැත්තේ? (Obata avashyada bhashaava mehi novatheneva?)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to take part in the translation program and get rewards" is not perfectly accurate. "ත්‍යාග දිනා ගැනීමට අප අමතන්න" (Thiyaaga dinaagettu apa amatanna) literally means 'contact us to win rewards', which implies a direct reward for contacting, not necessarily joining a program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ භාෂාව පරිවර්තනය කිරීමට අප හා සම්බන්ධ වන්න. <1>{{supportEmail}}</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>` tags are present in the Sinhala translation. These should be removed if they are not intended as part of the text's meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the `<1>` tags surrounding the email address.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'take part in the translation program' is not accurately reflected by 'pridať k prekladateľom'. A more accurate translation would emphasize participation in a program, not just joining translators.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'zúčastniť sa prekladateľského programu' or 'pripojiť sa k prekladateľskému tímu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is not accurately reflected in the Slovenian translation. "Sodelovanje pri prevodu" is more akin to 'collaboration in translation' and doesn't convey the idea of being *invited* to participate in a program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing closer to 'pridruži se programu prevajanja' (join the translation program) or 'postani del programa prevajanja' (become part of the translation program).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "rewards" is generic. A more specific and appealing term might be more effective in Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'nagrade in priznanja' (rewards and recognition) or 'darila' (gifts), depending on the specific rewards being offered.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is not accurately reflected. "Будете део програма за превођење" translates more literally to "be part of the translation program", which misses the active meaning of participating.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Не можете пронаћи ваш језик? Контактирајте нас на <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> да учествујете у програму за превођење и добијете награде.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is not accurately translated. 'Çeviride yer almak' is a more literal translation of 'to be in the translation,' not 'to participate in the translation program'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dilinizi bulamıyor musunuz? Çeviri programımıza katılmak için <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> adresinden bize ulaşın ve ödüller kazanın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is not standard and may cause rendering issues. It's unclear what this is intended to represent. Assuming it's meant to highlight or have a specific styling, the HTML should be reviewed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the purpose of <1> and use appropriate HTML tags or CSS classes instead. If it's meant to be bold, use <b> or <strong>. If it's for highlighting, review the desired visual effect.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation" is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. It implies the user is doing the translation themselves, not just participating in a translation program.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Участь у програмі перекладу (Participation in the translation program) or просто Зв'яжіться з нами (Contact us) would be more natural.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags <1> and </1> seem unnecessary and might cause rendering issues. It's unclear what these are intended to do.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the tags <1> and </1>. The email address should be rendered normally within the text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "take part in the translation program" is translated as "tham gia phiên dịch".  "Phiên dịch" usually refers to interpreting, not translation. A more appropriate translation for 'translation program' would be 'chương trình dịch thuật'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy liên hệ với chúng tôi tại <1>{{supportEmail}}</1> để tham gia chương trình dịch thuật và nhận phần thưởng.
